izzy.features.weight_of_evidence¶

izzy.features.weight_of_evidence(y, total_miss, total_hit, hit_class=1.0, iv=False)[source]¶

Computes the weight of evidence

Parameters

  • y (ArrayLike) – True outcomes for subpopulation

  • total_miss (int) – Sum of all “misses” in population

  • total_hit (int) – Sum of all “hits” in population

  • hit_class (int, float, str, or bool) – Positive outcome class label

  • iv (bool) – Should we return weight of evidence or information value (IV)?

Returns

weight of evidence

Return type

float
